author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE LATER TODAY WELL EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary: ...KIKO EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE LATER TODAY WELL EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 5:00 AM HST Wed Sep 03 the center of Kiko was located near 13.9, -130.6 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 970 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE LATER TODAY WELL EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 5:00 AM HST Wed Sep 03 the center of Kiko was located near 13.9, -130.6 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 970 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
